title: Xbox Series X
description: Powerful gaming console with 4K graphics and ultra-fast processing speed.

title: Surface Pro 7
description: Hybrid laptop/tablet with high-resolution touch screen and long battery life.

title: Xbox Series S
description: Small but powerful gaming console with 1440p graphics and ultra-fast processing speed.

title: Surface Laptop 3
description: Stylish and powerful laptop with fast performance, high-resolution touch screen, and long battery life.

title: Microsoft Office 365
description: Cloud-based suite of productivity tools including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook.

title: Microsoft Surface Studio 2
description: All-in-one desktop computer with high-resolution touch screen and powerful performance.

title: Microsoft Surface Book 3
description: Powerful and versatile laptop with detachable touch screen for use as a tablet.

title: Microsoft Surface Go 2
description: Lightweight and portable tablet with high-resolution touch screen and long battery life.

title: Microsoft Surface Pro X
description: Ultra-thin and versatile laptop/tablet with high-resolution touch screen and long battery life.

title: Microsoft Surface Duo
description: Dual-screen smartphone with innovative design and productivity-enhancing features.

title: Xbox One X
description: Powerful gaming console with 4K graphics and immersive gaming experience.

title: Xbox Game Pass Ultimate
description: Subscription service that provides access to a vast library of games for Xbox and PC.

title: Microsoft Office Home and Student 2019
description: Productivity suite that includes Word, Excel, and PowerPoint for home and student use.

title: Windows 10 Pro
description: Advanced version of Microsoft's operating system with enhanced security and management features.

title: Microsoft Surface Laptop Go
description: Lightweight and stylish laptop with fast performance and long battery life.

title: Microsoft Surface Book 2
description: Powerful and versatile laptop with detachable touch screen for use as a tablet.

title: Microsoft Word
description: A word processing software used for creating, editing, and formatting documents.

title: Microsoft Excel
description: A spreadsheet software used for organizing, analyzing, and visualizing data.

title: Microsoft PowerPoint
description: A presentation software used for creating and delivering engaging and impactful presentations.

title: Microsoft Outlook
description: An email and personal information management software used for managing emails, calendars, and contacts.

title: Microsoft Access
description: A database management software used for creating and managing databases.

title: Microsoft OneNote
description: A note-taking software used for capturing and organizing notes, ideas, and information.

title: Microsoft Publisher
description: A desktop publishing software used for creating and publishing professional-looking documents and marketing materials.

title: Microsoft Teams
description: A collaboration software used for chat, video calls, and file sharing among team members.

title: Microsoft Power BI
description: A business analytics service used for analyzing data and sharing insights through interactive visualizations and reports.

title: Microsoft Dynamics 365
description: A cloud-based business management software used for customer relationship management, enterprise resource planning, and business intelligence.

title: Microsoft Azure
description: A cloud computing platform used for building, deploying, and managing applications and services through a global network of data centers.

title: Microsoft Visual Studio
description: An integrated development environment used for creating and testing software applications for Windows, Android, and iOS platforms.

title: Microsoft Edge
description: A web browser developed by Microsoft and included in Windows 10, used for browsing the internet and accessing online services.

title: Microsoft HoloLens
description: A mixed reality headset developed by Microsoft, used for creating and experiencing interactive holographic experiences.

title: Microsoft Bing
description: A search engine developed by Microsoft, used for finding information and browsing the web.

title: Microsoft Visual Studio Code
description: A free source-code editor developed by Microsoft, used for building and debugging software applications.

title: Halo
description: A first-person shooter video game franchise developed by Bungie and 343 Industries, exclusive to Xbox consoles and Windows.

title: Forza Horizon
description: An open-world racing video game series developed by Playground Games, exclusive to Xbox consoles and Windows.

title: Gears of War
description: A third-person shooter video game franchise developed by Epic Games and The Coalition, exclusive to Xbox consoles and Windows.

title: Minecraft
description: A sandbox video game developed by Mojang Studios, acquired by Microsoft in 2014, available on multiple platforms including Xbox and Windows.

title: Sea of Thieves
description: An action-adventure video game developed by Rare, exclusive to Xbox consoles and Windows.

title: Age of Empires
description: A real-time strategy video game franchise developed by Ensemble Studios and Relic Entertainment, exclusive to Windows.

title: Flight Simulator
description: A flight simulation video game franchise developed by Microsoft, exclusive to Windows.

title: Azure Virtual Machines
description: A service that provides virtual machines on demand for running applications and workloads on the cloud.

title: Azure App Service
description: A platform-as-a-service that enables developers to build, deploy, and scale web and mobile applications on the cloud.

title: Azure Functions
description: A serverless computing service that enables developers to run event-driven code on the cloud, without managing infrastructure.

title: Azure Cosmos DB
description: A globally distributed database service that enables developers to build highly scalable and responsive applications on the cloud.

title: Azure Cognitive Services
description: A suite of artificial intelligence services that enable developers to add intelligent features such as speech recognition, computer vision, and natural language processing to their applications.

title: Azure DevOps
description: A suite of services that enable developers to plan, build, test, and deploy software applications with automated workflows on the cloud.

title: Azure Kubernetes Service
description: A fully managed service that enables developers to deploy and manage containerized applications with Kubernetes orchestration on the cloud.

title: Azure Blob Storage
description: A service that provides scalable and cost-effective storage for unstructured data such as images, videos, and documents on the cloud.

title: Azure SQL Database
description: A managed relational database service that provides high availability, security, and performance on the cloud.

title: Azure Stream Analytics
description: A real-time data analytics service that enables developers to process and analyze streaming data from various sources on the cloud.

title: Azure Backup
description: A service that provides backup and recovery for virtual machines, applications, and data on the cloud.

title: Azure Databricks
description: A fast, easy, and collaborative Apache Spark-based analytics platform that enables developers to process big data and build machine learning models on the cloud.

title: Azure ExpressRoute
description: A dedicated private connection between on-premises infrastructure and Azure datacenters for high-performance and secure access to cloud resources.

title: Azure Site Recovery
description: A disaster recovery service that provides replication, failover, and recovery for virtual machines and applications on the cloud.

title: Azure Active Directory
description: A cloud-based identity and access management service.

title: Azure Data Factory
description: A cloud-based data integration service.

title: Azure Event Grid
description: A fully-managed event routing service.

title: Azure Key Vault
description: A cloud-based service for managing cryptographic keys and secrets.

title: Azure Logic Apps
description: A cloud-based service for building and automating workflows and integrations.

title: Azure Machine Learning
description: A cloud-based service for building and deploying machine learning models.

title: Azure Security Center
description: A unified security management and threat protection service.

title: Power Apps
description: A low-code development platform for building custom business applications.

title: Power BI
description: A business analytics service that provides interactive visualizations and business intelligence capabilities.

title: Power Automate
description: A cloud-based service for building and automating workflows across various applications and services.

title: Power Virtual Agents
description: A no-code chatbot building service that enables developers to create and deploy chatbots to various channels.

title: Dataverse
description: A low-code data platform that provides a standardized data schema, data management, and application development capabilities.

title: AI Builder
description: A no-code artificial intelligence service that enables developers to add pre-built AI models or build custom models using a simple interface.

title: Azure Functions Premium
description: A serverless computing service with advanced scaling and networking capabilities for running event-driven code on the cloud.

title: Azure Arc
description: A hybrid cloud management service that enables customers to manage resources across on-premises, multi-cloud, and edge environments.

title: Azure Front Door
description: A global, scalable, and secure entry point for web applications and APIs on the cloud.

title: Azure Sphere
description: A comprehensive IoT security solution that provides a secured hardware platform, an operating system, and a cloud-based security service.

title: Azure Synapse Analytics
description: A limitless analytics service that brings together big data and data warehousing on the cloud.

title: Azure Firewall
description: A cloud-based network security service that provides inbound and outbound protection for virtual networks and applications.

title: Azure Maps
description: A set of location-based services and APIs for building and integrating maps, geocoding, routing, and traffic data into applications.

title: Azure Data Lake Storage
description: A scalable and secure data lake storage service for big data analytics on the cloud.

title: Windows Server
description: A server operating system designed for running applications, services, and infrastructure on-premises or in hybrid environments.

title: SQL Server
description: A relational database management system for storing, organizing, and managing data on-premises or in hybrid environments.

title: SharePoint Server
description: A collaboration and content management platform for building intranets, portals, and document management systems on-premises or in hybrid environments.

title: Exchange Server
description: A messaging and collaboration platform for managing email, calendar, and contacts on-premises or in hybrid environments.

title: System Center Configuration Manager
description: A systems management tool for deploying, managing, and securing devices, applications, and updates on-premises or in hybrid environments.

title: Skype for Business Server
description: A unified communications platform for instant messaging, voice and video calls, and online meetings on-premises or in hybrid environments.

title: Visual Studio
description: An integrated development environment for building applications, services, and games for Windows, Android, iOS, and web platforms.
